page.title: 09Sport
page.content: In our Domesday block there is quite a lot of sport.There are football pitches, putting courses,tennis courts and cricket pitches.Football and cricket is played at Baytree Recreation ground.There are four football pitches at Baytree and 3 Boys teams play there:Worle,Milton Nomads and Milton Crusaders and they all have under 10's to under 16's.Cricket is also played at Baytree.There is also a football pitch at Worle Recreation ground where Worle Old Boys play.There are 6 tennis courts at Ashcombe park:3 at the top and 3 at the bottom.Also at Ashcombe park there is a putting course which has 18 holes .At Worle school there is an all weather hockey pitch which local teams use.
